channel.title: Game Save
channel.description:
When My Server Saves, it automatically kicks to Player Off.
in my server.bat i get this
[code] Starting ***** Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4310 Client type: high memory version UserId: 85192721 admin ***** is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-admin surfer]: Case 130: 0 Game saved for player admin ***** ClientHandler: Client admin ***** disconnected. [/code]
AnyHelp?
